title: Sonic: Half Price Ice Cream Cones on 9/23
content:
Tomorrow only, 9/23, Sonic is running a special on ice cream – get them 1/2 price all day today! 
 
You don’t need a coupon for this, and it’s going on throughout the day.  Find out more info on the Sonic Facebook Page here ! 
 
  
 
Check out more restaurant coupons and deals! 
 
The post Sonic: Half Price Ice Cream Cones on 9/23 appeared first on Time 2 Save Workshops .
